## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                          | Type                | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- | ----------- |
| `opened` | `opened`  | Only used in css to change styling by default props are immutable inside component, to make them mutable use mutable | `boolean`           | `undefined` |
| `slide`  | `slide`   | Prop use that governs the direction of the Drawer slide                                                              | `"left" \| "right"` | `'left'`    |
